name: parent_id
description: An integer WOF ID of the direct parent record. If a record has more than one parent, the following values should be used: -1 (unknown parent, record needs review), -2 (shrug, this feature is complicated), -3 (contested, but not disputed.. used for placetypes below the locality level), or -4 (multiple legal parents.. used for placetypes at the locality level or above).
